verses.name: Genesis 11:18
verses.text: And Peleg lived thirty years, and begat Reu:

verses.name: Genesis 11:19
verses.text: And Peleg lived after he begat Reu two hundred and nine years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:20
verses.text: And Reu lived two and thirty years, and begat Serug:

verses.name: Genesis 11:21
verses.text: And Reu lived after he begat Serug two hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:22
verses.text: And Serug lived thirty years, and begat Nahor:

verses.name: Genesis 11:23
verses.text: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:24
verses.text: And Nahor lived nine and twenty years, and begat Terah:
